metadata.description: Internal Treasure Data skills for Claude Code to enhance productivity with TD-specific tools and workflows

plugins.name: sql-skills
plugins.description: Collection of SQL query skills for Treasure Data including Trino and Hive query optimization, TD-specific functions (TD_INTERVAL, TD_TIME_RANGE), and best practices for writing efficient queries

plugins.name: workflow-skills
plugins.description: Collection of workflow management skills including digdag workflow creation, orchestration patterns, error handling, debugging, monitoring, and optimization of TD workflows

plugins.name: dbt-skills
plugins.description: Skills for using dbt (data build tool) with Treasure Data Trino including setup, TD-specific macros, incremental models, and troubleshooting

plugins.name: sdk-skills
plugins.description: Skills for using Treasure Data SDKs including JavaScript SDK for browser-based event tracking and pytd (Python SDK) for querying data, importing pandas DataFrames, and building analytical pipelines

plugins.name: cli-skills
plugins.description: Skills for using command-line tools with Treasure Data including Trino CLI for interactive queries and TD MCP server for Claude Code integration with natural language data exploration

plugins.name: template-skill
plugins.description: Template for creating new TD-specific Claude Code skills with best practices and standard structure
